          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Resistors in series</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Widerstände in den Serien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Résistances en série</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Resistores em série</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Resistori in serie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντιστάτες στη σειρά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Resistores en series</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows two resistors in series whose total resistance equals the sum of the individual resistances. In this type of circuit, each circuit component receives the same amount of current.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">batteries</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Cells</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circuit diagrams</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">closed circuits</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">currents</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">resistance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Resistors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">series circuits</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Voltage</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt zwei Widerstände in den 
Serien deren Gesamtwiderstand der Summe der einzelnen Widerstände 
entspricht. In diesem Typen des Stromkreises, empfängt jeder 
Stromkreisbestandteil die gleiche Menge des Stromes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre deux résistances en 
série dont la résistance totale égale la somme des différentes 
résistances. Dans ce type de circuit, chaque composant de 
circuit reçoit la même quantité de courant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra dois resistores em série
cuja a resistência total iguala a soma das resistências individuais.
Neste tipo de circuito, cada componente do circuito recebe a 
mesma quantidade de corrente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra due resistori in serie
di cui la resistenza totale è uguale la somma di diverse resistenze. 
In questo tipo di circuito, ogni componente del circuito riceve 
la stessa quantità di corrente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει δύο αντιστάτες στη σειρά
η της οποίας συνολική αντίσταση είναι ίση με το ποσό των 
μεμονωμένων αντιστάσεων. Σε αυτόν τον τύπο κυκλώματος, 
κάθε τμήμα κυκλωμάτων λαμβάνει το ίδιο ποσό ρεύματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra dos resistores en las 
series que resistencia total iguala la suma de las resistencias 
individuales. En este tipo de circuito, cada componente del 
circuito recibe la misma cantidad de corriente.</string>
          </description>
